desc: Enjoy faster browsing speeds, fewer ads and a safer more private internet with Winston. Winston is a convenient privacy product for everyone — a hardware device that stops the junk from getting on your network, protects your entire home and all devices from hackers, corporate spies and mass surveillance.

layout.text: Protect your privacy on every device you own... without a VPN!
Enjoy faster browsing, fewer ads and safer, more private internet with Winston, the internet scrambler that stops big tech spying, annoying ads and other nuisances.
Stop big tech spying and tracking
Up to 10x faster speeds than a VPN
